wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Basil Zochonis  (2 October 1929 – 30 November 2013) was a British industrialist and philanthropist, the chairman of PZ Cussons, and the great nephew of its founder, George Zochonis.

response: He died in 1929. After his death control of the business passed to Constantine Zochonis, his nephew, and then more recently, to John Zochonis (Constantine's son).Sir John Zochonis Manchester Evening News, 9 May 2006
* John Zochonis (1929–2013), British industrialist, chairman of PZ Cussons
He was the father of Sir John Zochonis.
